twoSetSkill.name: Planck Constant 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: When attacked and when DMG taken is less than the product of 15 x Valkyrie's level, the host will not be interrupted (but takes DMG as usual). When equipped on Bronya, ranged attacks gain 15% Total DMG Multiplier.

threeSetSkill.name: Quantum Entanglement 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Hitting an enemy heals 5% HP. CD: 5.0s. When equipped on Bronya, gain 30% SP recovery rate.
